data.text: -Ruby, it's a pleasure to meet you.

translation.text: -Ruby, rất vui được gặp bạn.

data.text: I've seen your work and I'm a big fan,

data.text: but for those that don't know, you're from Australia, right?

title: Ruby Rose Bought Her Mom a Giant Killer Pig
